bugs.component: Core:DOM: Copy & Paste and Drag & Drop
bugs.summary: Images copied from Firefox fail to paste into Chromium apps.
Esmify test files in dom/
Downloading a txt file from b.m.o does not trigger the "completed download" animation, and the file is not added to the Downloads list
Assertion failure: aRHEntry, at /builds/worker/checkouts/gecko/ipc/glue/BackgroundUtils.cpp:370
Rework how WorkerLoadContext is held on the main thread
HTML Markup Map to support datetime-local inputs
Make "MOZ_PROFILER_SHUTDOWN=filename-%p.json" output profiles from all processes
Include the CPU name in the meta data of profiles
Crash [@ active_edges]
Verify if we actually shutdown the CanvasRenderThread
Assertion failure: owner->mLatestTextureHost->GetSize() == size, at /gfx/layers/RemoteTextureMap.cpp:348
Only enable OOP WebGL on Android on Nightly
Optimize the obj_toString call in OrdinaryToPrimitive
Document JS::Value representation better
[loong64] Some jit-tests failed due to scratch register usage conflict: Assertion failure: !this->has(reg), at js/src/jit/RegisterSets.h:820
ResizeObserver devicePixelContentBox size still broken
Convert more frame manipulation APIs to take rvalue reference of nsFrameList
remove unused nsCSSFrameConstructor::mIsDestroyingFrameTree
Last Baseline for Scrollable Frame Always Not Existing is Too Strict
Japanese font kerning problems in www.pixiv.net after Bug 1797431
Add telemetry for first contentful paint keyed by TRR provider
Easier testing of TLS errors and feature that are visible to necko
nsHttpConnectionMgr::PostEvent can execute long-lasting nsSocketTransportService::OnDispatchedEvent under a lock
Pref set using `mach mochitest --setpref` is no longer reflected in value returned from SpecialPowers.getCharPref()
Implement cookie banner handle toggle on the protection panel.
Intermittent dom/cache/test/marionette/test_caches_delete_cleanup_after_shutdown.py CachesDeleteCleanupAtShutdownTestCase.test_ensure_cache_cleanup_after_clean_restart | AssertionError
Verify if the IndexedDB connection pool threads are explicitly closed on shutdown
Make nsSystemInfo return the CPU model name
Check if we can substitute gXPCOMThreadsShutDown with AppShutdown::IsInOrBeyond(ShutdownPhase::?)
pretty-print of file not available when sourceMappingURL comment exists
Support try presets
Adjust color-mix for secondary text to better align with design spec
Update disclosure arrow direction and positioning on Firefox View for closed tab and synced tabs lists
Unable to switch from Firefox View directly to other tabs using TAB key
Make possible import data from (new) Opera
Send telemetry for Pocket sponsored tiles
Presenters who aren't ready shouldn't have to "Block" future permissions to back out of screen picker
Show the bookmarks toolbar for new tab / homepage set to blank page (about:blank)
OverflowableToolbar should be able to put overflowable WebExtension browser_actions into the Unified WebExtensions panel.
Remove search related python build files that are no longer used
virtualenv error with Python 3.10: No such file or directory: '[...]lib/python3.10/site-packages/mach.pth'
Update builders to clang 15
Update to JDK 17.0.5
Migrate image jobs from AWS to GCP
Partner repacks no longer need to handle the "searchplugins" directory
Migrate toolkit/modules/tests to ES modules
Add async IOUtils equivalents of FileUtils.getFile / FileUtils.getDir
Remove osfile.jsm usage from browser/base/content (pt 2)
Adjust gAppData so that empty-string values are NULLs
Right clicking on the extensions icon in toolbar will open the page alongside the dropdown menu
Link to rendered documentation at firefox-source-docs.mozilla.org
